EmailTemplate.description: Close the case using this template in case we do not receive any response from the customer
EmailTemplate.name: No reply from customer
EmailTemplate.subject: No reply
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
As I have not heard back from you, I hope your request has been resolved to your desired satisfaction.
<You will shortly recieve a system generated email informing you of the closure of the case> . <In that email, you will find a link to a feedback survey regarding your support experience today and how we may serve you better in the future> .
If you require any further assistance, please do not hesitate to contact us.
Kind regards, {!Case.OwnerFullName} IHS Markit | Customer Care Support Portal
